edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam
Interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory

All Superinterfaces:
FullyInitializable, Initializable, LidaModule, Saveable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MockPAM, PerceptualAssociativeMemoryImpl
public interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory
extends LidaModule, Saveable

A main LIDA module which contains feature detectors, nodes, and links.

Author:
Ryan J. McCall

Method Detail

addNewNode

PamNode addNewNode(java.lang.String label)
Creates and adds a new Node to this PerceptualAssociativeMemory with specified label. The new node is returned. Default PamNode type is used.

Parameters:
label - label of new node
Returns:
the new node

addNewNode

PamNode addNewNode(java.lang.String type,
                   java.lang.String label)
Creates and adds a new Node to this PerceptualAssociativeMemory with specified label and PamNode type. New node is returned.

Parameters:
type - type of PamNode used.
label - label of new node
Returns:
the new node

propagateActivation

void propagateActivation(PamNode source,
                         PamNode sink,
                         PamLink link,
                         double amount)
Propagate activation from a PamNode to another PamNode along a PamLink. Excites both link and sink

Parameters:
source - source of activation
sink - recipient of activation
link - link between source and sink
amount - activation sent

propagateActivationToParents(PamNode)
